songs.title: Between Two Lungs
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Oooh oooh oooh oooh oooh oooh ooh ooh ooh ooh)
Between two lungs it was released
The breath that carried me (oooh oooh)
The sigh that blew me forward (oooh oooh)

[Pre-Chorus]
Because it was trapped
Trapped between two lungs
It was trapped between two lungs
It was trapped between two lungs

[Chorus]
And my running feet could fly
Each breath screaming, "we are all too young to die"

[Verse 1]
Between two lungs it was released (it was released)
The breath that passed from you to me (passed from you to me)
It flew between us as we slept (as we slept)
That slipped from your mouth into mine (mouth into mine)
It crept between two lungs (two lungs)
It was released (released)
The breath that passed from you to me (you to me)
It flew between us as we slept (as we slept)
That slipped from your mouth into mine (into mine)
It crept
(Oooh oooh oooh oooh ooh oooh aah ah ah ah ah aha ah)

[Pre-Chorus]
Because it was trapped
Trapped between two lungs
It was trapped between two lungs
It was trapped between two lungs

[Verse 2]
Gone are the days of begging
The days of theft
No more gasping for a breath
The air has filled me head to toe (head to toe)
And I can see the ground far below
I have this breath and I hold it tight
And I keep it in my chest with all my might
I pray to God this breath will last

[Outro]
As it pushes past my lips
As I
Gasp, gasp
(Ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah)
Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
